registerListeners

public void registerListeners(org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene,
                              org.anddev.andengine.ui.activity.BaseGameActivity activity)
Description copied from interface: IControlScheme
Register listeners for control events such as tilt, touch, etc. This needs to be in the subclass since each one will listen for different events

Specified by:
registerListeners in interface IControlScheme
Parameters:
scene - Needed to register some listeners
activity - Needed to register others

onSceneTouchEvent

public boolean onSceneTouchEvent(org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene pScene,
                                 org.anddev.andengine.input.touch.TouchEvent pSceneTouchEvent)
Description copied from interface: org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene.IOnSceneTouchListener
Called when a TouchEvent is dispatched to a Scene.

Specified by:
onSceneTouchEvent in interface org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene.IOnSceneTouchListener
Parameters:
pScene - The Scene that the TouchEvent has been dispatched to.
pSceneTouchEvent - The TouchEvent object containing full information about the event.
Returns:
true if this Scene.IOnSceneTouchListener has consumed the TouchEvent, false otherwise.
